de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.session

Interface ImSessionContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDefaultImSession, DefaultImcSession, DefaultImvSession

    public interface ImSessionContext
    Generic IM(C/V) session parameter set. It contains values, that are specific for the underlying connection.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object getAttribute(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.TncAttributeType type)
      Returns a connection specific attribute identified by the type.
      de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.connection.TncConnectionState getConnectionState()
      Returns the current connection state.
      void requestConnectionHandshakeRetry(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.enums.ImHandshakeRetryReasonEnum reason)
      Requests a handshake retry for the underlying connection with the given reason.
